attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Because of the following blunders it is time the electorate had a chance to have their say on who should govern us

Most recently HMRC have lost a copy of a database data containing the name, address, date of birth, National Insurance number and, where relevant, bank details of 25 million people.

The government covered up after 5,000 illegal immigrants were mistakenly cleared to work as security guards.

The incompetent mismanagement of the tax credit system has resulted in some of Britain's poorest households having to return £2 billion worth of overpayment.

And I can go on, and on.....come on Gordon, you know it's the right thing to do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
